summary: Iteration 14 - All bug fixes verified for Hatake.Social TCG Platform. Backend APIs (17/17 tests passed) and frontend UI functioning correctly.

issues: Products without uploaded images show Package placeholder icons - this is EXPECTED behavior per main agent note

1_collection_delete_api.evidence: DELETE /api/collection?id={id} with Bearer token works correctly. Test added card, retrieved ID, deleted successfully.

2_mtg_search_without_name_prefix.evidence: Scryfall search without 'name:' prefix returns results. Direct test of partial name search 'lightning' returned cards.
2_mtg_search_without_name_prefix.lines: 253-258 - Card name used directly without name: prefix

3_shop_product_images_grid.evidence: Shop grid shows 5 products: 2 with uploaded images (binder, deckbox) display correctly, 3 without images show Package placeholder
3_shop_product_images_grid.note: Products without images showing Package icon is EXPECTED - per main agent: 'grid placeholder icons are for products without uploaded images'

4_shop_product_modal_images.evidence: Modal displays product image when available, shows Package placeholder when no image uploaded
4_shop_product_modal_images.lines: 700-718 - Modal image rendering with fallback to Package icon

5_feed_api_with_reactions.evidence: GET /api/feed returns posts with 'reactions' array containing emoji, count, userReacted fields
5_feed_api_with_reactions.lines: 85-92 - Posts include reactions from getPostReactions helper

6_feed_like_toggle.evidence: POST /api/feed/{postId}/like toggles like status, returns {success: true, liked: boolean}

7_feed_reactions_emoji.evidence: POST /api/feed/{postId}/reactions with emoji body adds/removes emoji reaction

seed_data_creation: Created temporary test card for delete test (cleaned up after)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 7 reported bugs verified. Backend APIs working correctly including collection delete, feed with reactions, like toggle, and emoji reactions. Shop products display correctly - products without uploaded images show placeholder icons which is expected behavior. MTG search using Scryfall without name: prefix works for partial matching.
